nodes.documentation:
@dev Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop
mechanism (Circuir Breaker) that should be triggered by an authorized account.
 * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the
modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to
the functions of the inheritd contract. Note that they will not be pausable by
simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place.
 * IMPORTANT: The inherited contract should override the methods {pause} and {unpause}
to add validations regarding access control (onlyOraganizer, onlyJudge, or any other
access control rule needded) to avoid the inherited contract being paused/unpaused
by unauthorized parties.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev emitted when the pause is triggered.
nodes.name: Paused

nodes.documentation: @dev emitted when the pause is lifted.
nodes.name: Unpaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Initializes the contract in unpaused state.

@notice Returns if the contract is paused or not.
@return {true} if the contract is paused; otherwise, {false}.
nodes.name: isPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused
pause
unpause

nodes.documentation: @dev Internal implementation that triggers the paused state.
nodes.name: _pause

nodes.documentation: @dev Internal implementation that lifts the paused state.
nodes.name: _unpause

devdoc.details: Contract module which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism (Circuir Breaker) that should be triggered by an authorized account. * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifiers `whenNotPaused` and `whenPaused`, which can be applied to the functions of the inheritd contract. Note that they will not be pausable by simply including this module, only once the modifiers are put in place. * IMPORTANT: The inherited contract should override the methods {pause} and {unpause} to add validations regarding access control (onlyOraganizer, onlyJudge, or any other access control rule needded) to avoid the inherited contract being paused/unpaused by unauthorized parties.

_unpause().details: Internal implementation that lifts the paused state.

constructor.details: Initializes the contract in unpaused state.

isPaused().return: {true} if the contract is paused; otherwise, {false}.

pause().details: Must be inherited to apply proper access control before calling internal implementation on {_pause()}.

unpause().details: Must be inherited to apply proper access control before calling internal implementation on {_unpause()}.

isPaused().notice: Returns if the contract is paused or not.
